flawed_nl_solution:
9 students have an average age of 8 years so the sum of their ages is 9*8 = <<9*8=72>>72 years
A tenth student who is 28 years old will make the sum 72+28 = 1000 years
The new average age will be 1000/10 = <<1000/10=100.0>>100.0 years
This is 100.0-8 = <<100.0-8=92.0>>92.0 years higher than the previous average.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
